overview: The gorgeous "Angel Eyes" Quintana (Gabriela Platas) returns to challenge the menacing mob queen known as Goddess (Makarenko Guerrero), who responds by offering $1 million to the first of five world-class hit men who can hunt down and kill Quintana. The battle is on for control of a crime empire in this sexy made-for-television thriller. Félix Lozano, Ivan Moncayo, Manuel Mutis, Alberto Palafox, Hamlet Ramírez and Homero Garza co-star.
title: A Bullet for Quintana
